statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, json_extract(purchase_history, '$.total_purchases') AS total_purchases FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history->>'$.most_recent_purchase' AS most_recent_purchase FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.product_name, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.price FROM products p JOIN purchases pur ON p.product_id = pur.purchase_id JOIN customers c ON pur.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 3;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.name, OrderDetails.quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id INNER JOIN Products ON OrderDetails.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address_line, city, state FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT address_line, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
